A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's a movie that takes risks and exercises creative freedom in a universe that's always embraced fresh new ideas. While I did disagree with some moments\, I was involved the entire time. It takes steps forward instead of staying intrenched in the past and gives this new trilogy reason to exist at all. It's not a 5\, but I give it that score considering the source material Rian Johnson had to work with. Rian Johnson has created a work of art and passion and it shows.
